pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate and Visualize 'SNOTEL' Snow Data and Seasonality // Programmatic interface to the 'SNOTEL' snow data (https://www.nrcs.usda.gov/wps/portal/wcc/home). Provides easy downloads of snow data into your R work space or a local directory. Additional post-processing routines to extract snow season indexes are provided.
